DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read short notes of the signed-in user
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all the short notes a sign-in user has access to.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your short notes.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all the short notes without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read, create, edit, and delete short notes of the signed-in user
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete short notes of a signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read, create, edit, and delete your short notes
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete your short notes.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read, create, edit, and delete all users' short notes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete all the short notes without a signed-in user.
